name: Gambler's Prep School
description:
Current version: 0.3

*Due to some changes the Chrome made last year, Ren'Py games might not work in Google Chrome and Microsoft Edge.  If your game doesn't work, please try another browser (tryed it out in Mozilla Firefoxs, and it worked with no problems).

The game in this version, can still be cleared, but for now, you can only play Craps, and Magic Dice.

Gamer's prepschool is a casino game made in Ren'Py. The game features 6 popular casino games (Black Jack, Holdem Poker, Five Card Draw, Dice Poker, Magic Dice and Craps), the game is working and fully playable, but there are some engine limitations, so please avoid pressing random buttons at inappropriate times. 

As I said, the engine is not ideal for this sort of game, but I'm intending to use some of those games in visual novels, and they're also available as Ren'Py plugins.

Currently available plugins:
